kpi.name: m3072c0013

kpi_info.title: NUMBER OF DOWNLINK UDP PACKETS DROPPED DUE TO UPLINK FLOW INITIATION
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of downlink UDP packets dropped per session profile due to uplink flow initiation. The flow initiation direction is set through the flow-initiation parameter in the PCC rule filter configuration. UPDATED: Updated when a downlink UDP packet is dropped due to uplink flow initiation.

kpi.kpi_alias: NUMBER OF DOWNLINK UDP PACKETS DROPPED DUE TO UPLINK FLOW INITIATION
